Title: Gross product don't buy
Review: Gross smell made hair fall n tangles

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Get Shea Moisture Instead
Review: Not good. Left my hair stringy and a lot of it was falling out and no nice curls. Get Shea moisture instead.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Mislabeled, not for curly hair
Review: Pros : it smells amazing very sweet, and very tropical, easy to applyCons : I read pineapple curls as “ smells like pineapple, for curly hair.” I have naturally thick hair and tight curls, this deflated my hair and was greasy within 6 hours!Labeled as “for all hair types” This is not for my hair type.I want to say, it smells amazing and is very easy to use, the shampoo lathers up really nice. It should just be more clear…This would be great for fine hair.I am writing this so others avoid my mistake.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Really good product
Review: After using this product for a couple of weeks, I can definitely notice a difference. I use a diffuser, so strays like to pop up, but it keeps enough moisture in my hair to help it look full, and not frizzy! It smells amazing as well!

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Wonderful hair product, but needs a seal
Review: Nice product for hair with a lovely scent and free of harsh chemicals and vegan. However, the the containers are NOT sealed. Why make such a nice product and not put a simple piece of foil or plastic? The lid came off during shipping from Amazon in their usual thin plastic one-day mailers and it spilled out all over three other items that I purchased. Please make products with a seal. That way people know that they’re getting the product that is supposed to be in the container, as packed from the manufacturer, and it’s more hygienic feeling to open a sealed product, and it doesn’t spill out all over everything resulting in product loss when shipped. Kudos to great products—Keep making wonderful products! I love all of the unique options, scents, and safer ingredients. Packaging is beautiful.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Too light to detangle
Review: If your curls get tangled and you rely on conditioner to help detangle, this is not for you. It is too lightweight to help get the tangled out, unlike thicker conditioners. This is a problem for thick curly hair.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: better than expected
Review: first i will disclose i used the matching shampoo and conditioner first. When my hair was still damp after my shower, I put this cream in and scrunched a bit. then I twisted it on top of my head and slept on it. When I woke up the next morning my hair was barely damp, but so soft and curly. I brushed through my hair with my fingers, scrunched a bit and went out the door (after coffee of course) I have gotten so many comments at work. The scent does fade, you won't smell like pineapple all day. The scent is actually up in the air. When the package first came I had everyone in my family smell. I smelled pineapple and so did one of my sons, My other son smelled coconut, as did my fiance. My daughter shrugged and said it smelled like pina colada. No regrets on this purchase though!

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Smells great - works ok
Review: Great scent. Doesn’t hurt my hair - but def doesn’t make it look any better than the tressame bulk bottles the rest of my family uses..

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Less damaging
Review: Doesn’t foam as much BUT also less damaging for hair.  Allows for healthy curls.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Shampoo is great; not about the conditioner
Review: The shampoo is really lightweight and natural. It doesn’t dry out my hair. However, the conditioner is so watered down that my poor curls were so damaged from using it. I also have the leave in conditioner, but it does no justice for me either. It dried out my hair and leaves a heavy mousse sticky feel to my clean hair. I would continue to use the shampoo only. For reference, I have really fine wavy-curly hair

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Great product
Review: Gifted this to my friend who has curly hair like 2C curls. She noticed her curls more prominent and they looked so good, her pattern came back a little! SMELLS AMAZING

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Someone hates curly hair
Review: Literally the most drying thing I've ever put on my hair. I thought it was going to snap my hair off. I do NOT recommend unless you hate your curls.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Esta crema es ideal para nutrir los rizos. Lo uso sobre mi cabello seco para mejor efecto. Una cantidad pequeña a moderada es suficiente, ya que la crema es pesada y si se usa mucho puede disminuir el volumen del cabello. Huele muy rico y no deja residuos.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Recomiendo usarlo mezclándolo con otro producto. Sólo es muy grasoso

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: El diseño, olor y textura de este producto es muy bonito, sin embargo a mi no me funciono tan bien. Creo que funcionaría perfecto para personas de cabello fino y porosidad baja, apto para el método curly girl desde luego.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Es un producto excelente para el cabello chino. Desenreda el cabello super bien y tiene un aroma riquísimo.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: No funciona muy bien. Prefiero la crema para peinar de andalou.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Natural Conditioner, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, Sulfate Free and Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Verified Purchase
Review: Si me gustó, huele muy rico a piña y a frutas, deja los rizos definidos

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: I don’t think this is legit.
Review: I LOVE this conditioner, it’s so good for my curly hair and works very well, that said what I received from my amazon subscribe and save order is NOT the conditioner I’ve been using.  This is the second bottle I’ve ordered, I noticed a difference in consistency when I gave my daughter the first bottle, but assumed they maybe changed the formula. I think this is counterfeit now with the second bottle after comparing, which  is disappointing, because a major factor in buying Pacifica products is that they are vegan and cruelty free, and with a counterfeit item you can pretty much guarantee that’s not the case.The left side of each photo is the bottle I just finished off, the right side is what was received from amazon.A) the bottles are very different, the amazon one looks and feels cheaply made, different graphic qualities too. Size is all wrong.B) the scent is not as strong and more vanilla with the amazon product, the product I normally buy has a strong fruity/pineapple scent.C) the consistency is SOOO different. The one I normally buy is thick and creamy, goes a long way. The one from amazon is thin like cheap conditioner.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Harsh conditioner negates the gentle shampoo
Review: (Reviewed as a set.) I love pineapple and wanted to love this product so much, I bought the set.  I have long, thick, curly, indigenous hair that tends to frizz; I'm also sensitive to scents, and lean toward natural products. SHAMPOO: Has a light, sweet, real-fruit smell that wants more depth, more power. It does not smell pina colada-y but I think I do get a whiff of banana (not my favorite). I imagine that scent is hard to balance in hair products; overall I like it. The lather is super thick with a nice, clean silky rinse and leaves my wet hair feeling clean and soft instead of stripped, with truly defined spiral curls. I can't detect any pineapple scent in my hair after rinsing. Feels nice, a good shampoo that is gentle enough to use often. However, I prefer washing 1x/week, so that's a little too gentle for me. But I liked it and was excited to try a conditioner that would amplify and continue that sweet, soft, curly feeling. It disappointed. CONDITIONER: Same scent, no issues. Feels light but strange and slick going on, and is actually too light/thin for thick hair. I had to use a lot of it, more than other conditioners, and had to press it into my hair to absorb-- it felt like a rebellious conditioner that didn't want to perform. It left the exact opposite feeling from the shampoo: greasy residue, not natural, ill-formulated, and drying. It clings to my hair, not in the way you want, so I had to rinse and rinse and rinse, negating the initial good shampoo. Pacifica products are not cheap in price, but are becoming more cheap in feel. My search for curly-hair cleansing products continues....

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: 2.0 out of 5 stars
Review: This is an average conditioner. The best feature is that it smells delicious. It's a thin conditioner and I can barely believe that it's intended for textured hair since it provides almost no moisture. This is best for straight, low porosity hair. It does nothing for my medium porosity, frizz prone wavy-curly hair. Maui Moisture has so many better options for a drug store brand. I also like the Garnier conditioners in the jars. They are silicone free as well!

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Curl relaxer not enhancer or definer
Review: I have thick wavy with loose curls hair.  This product flattened my hair and made it feel dirty (felt oily with built up residue)  This may be a good product for people with tight curls that want to relax them.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Great for Curly Hair
Review: In the past couple months I have learned the Curly Girl Method and I have been experimenting with some shampoos and conditioners. I really REALLY like this one a lot. It has a fruity smell that is a bit strong but not so strong to deter me (That is actually what worried me the most because I have a sensitive stomach when it comes to strong smells, and especially the "exotic" pineapple, banana, and such smells really make me keel over in the mornings). Initially, out of the bottle it is a bit strong but after washing it really isn't that strong, the smell of my shampoo is actually stronger. Anyways, sometimes I don't put in argon oil after showering to help keep my curls and I notice that with this conditioner, without the oil, it still helps keeps my curls nice. They are softer and a little looser without the oil or styler but it works great and I have been getting lots of compliments!

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Excellent for fine hair - a dupe for wavemaker.
Review: I was really hesitant to try this but I'm so glad I did. I have fine 2b high porosity hair (the kind that gets super frizzy in a little bit of humidity). I've used a tonne of products and this is def one of my all time favourites. It's alot like wavemaker and cantu - and I only use a peasized amount of it. Gives some volume (but doesn't make your hair feel weighed down or full of product). I don't really need to layer products with this but if I really want to, I add a spritz of the b&b invisible oil primer or homemade salt spray!

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Surprisingly light and long-lasting
Review: Love this stuff. It smells light and natural. I use a small pea sized amount for my shoulder length hair if I am pulling it back, and about twice that much if I am wearing it down. It defines the curls and keeps the frizzies down. It doesn't coat my hands, washes off easily, and doesn't weigh my hair down with heavy/waxy stuff like some products do. This small tube lasts a long time, too.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Curls POP and BOUNCE
Review: For my whole life I needed two bottles of conditioner per one bottle of shampoo...and that was just for the stuff I wasn't using for co-washing.  For the last 10 years or so I've been using DevaCurl, and I've rarely tried anything else.  I've been using 10-14 pumps of conditoner every day. I really overdid it the first time I tried Pineapple Curls and I was am still stunned that a small palmful coats and detangles all my hair! It's like I can't use a small enough amount!  I was worried that a 10 oz. tube would last me a week, but this conditioner is so concentrated, my daughter and I are both using it and it's lasting for weeks! This is my new favorite conditioner.  This does not weight my hair down in the least - instead it makes my curls spring and bounce.  I have 2c-3b (mostly 3a) low porosity, coarse curls. I wish I'd found this conditioner a long time ago! I am crazy about the smell...like vacation on Maui!

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: great product
Review: I have2c-3b curls and fine hair. Works great without weighing down-you dont need much

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Good stuff. Bigger bottle please
Review: Hi I have 3c curly hair and its bleach blonde and I been looking for something to replace my Cantu curl cream activator that I love but it's getting harder to find so I tried this curl defining cream and I really like it. My curls are shiny and  bouncy I do use a gel after nut I like it alot. I will say my only complaint is for 13 bucks I wish the bottle was bigger.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Wave Killer
Review: This conditioner killed my waves completely. I've been using curly girl approved products and building up my waves for about a year now and after one use of this conditioner my hair was straighter than before I started. I tried clarifying my hair and giving it another shot, but got the same results.The consistency of this product does seem strange, as other reviews stated. It's VERY watery, but I've never used it before so it's possible that this is normal and not the result of tampering.All in all, it makes my hair very soft and smooth, but I wouldn't recommend for wavy hair.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: I loved this until..
Review: So I have been having issues with allergies. My old cowash and conditioner started making me break out in hives (yikes) so I switched to a new cowash and this conditioner. I personally love this brand and had never used their hair products.The conditioner, while called pineapple, to me smells just like banana runts. I really loved it. Made my hair soft and made the wave and curl in my hair pop.Unfortunately, I started to have issues where everytime I used it, it made my head itch terribly. When I compared it to the other stuff I had issues with, I found an ingredient that they shared. So when looking for something new, I spent a lot of time to find something without that ingredient.Do highly recommend it though! Wish I could still use it.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Counterfeit or Watered Down...
Review: I love this product but it is definitely not the same product I've used in the past. It is much more watery - not the nice thick cream it normally is. I also noticed there was an ingredient sticker placed over the ingredients on the bottle. I checked the reviews to see if others had noticed anything different and sure enough some had and at least one person also had the sticker over the ingredients. I requested a refund and I am going to buy this one in store from now on. What a bummer because subscribe-and-save is so convenient.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Not even close to the Deva Curl Wavemaker
Review: If I use it with just mousse it does not moisture my hair enough, it actually leaves it quite dry and frizzy. I really wanted to like it because the packaging is so cute and many said the smell was great. To me the scent is nice but not as strong as say Cantu. I am using it mixed with Shea moisture coconut and hibiscus smoothie because that was too moisturizing lol so mixed together they work great. I am still searching for a replacement for the Devs Curl wavaker. This ain't it. For reference, I have thin, low density, medium porosity, 2C-3A hair.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Easy to manage hair & great scent
Review: This smells so good, I used too much the first time, just to inhale the tropical scent. My curls dragged down, so the next time I used less & my curls were bouncier. An unexpected benefit is that my thick hair wets down more easier for shampooing when I use this curl cream. I have thick hair & we have a lot of minerals in our water.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Fantastic product for my curls
Review: When my hairstylist told me that I should go with my natural curls, I tried so many different products but nothing seemed to work right. I am a natural blonde with thick curly short hair. This product is awesome. I wet my hair a little bit with Pacifica hair and body spray or water and then use the cream to crunch in my curls. Looks awesome every time.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Very different products
Review: Shampoo:-Nice light scent, pleasant and not overly sweet-Foamy and cleansing, while still being gentle-Hair feels super soft, even after rinsing-12oz bottle, nice designConditioner:-Same scent, maybe a bit muted-Wayyy to thin, it doesn't truly condition-Ruins the soft feeling from the shampoo-8oz bottle, and much more is needed than the shampoo. It'll run out way before the shampoo with the amount needed for it to somewhat work as conditioner. Even then, I don't think it's worth even using it.Conclusion:I absolutely recommend the shampoo, and I'll continue to use it. The conditioner may wind up in the trash. :(

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Good conditioner
Review: I have been CGM for 18 months. I have read multiple positive reviews about this product so I decided to try it.Now what I have learned in this journey is that your curls are not the same as mine so let me tell you about my curls. I have pretty tight curls. My hair is THIIIRRRRSSSTTTY so it desires moisture and my hair is average (not too thick or too thin)With this description, I’d like to tell you that my hair loved this product. It smells delicious, it works fabulous as a leave in but it is a tad runny so I used a lot. I think I used it 4 times and it’s gone. I’m going to buy it again because it made my hair bouncy, light and it looked moisturized.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Too thin...seems like a watered down return
Review: I've bought this conditioner before and loved it.  I bought it again and now it is very thin and even a bit foamy and it's like I didn't use conditioner at all.  I suspect this was a return that someone added water or something to.  To test that theory, I attempted a return and lo and behold they do allow returns.  I'm just throwing it....obviously Amazon is selling USED toiletries as NEW.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Killed my waves
Review: Naturally my hair does a beach wave. I’ve been working to encourage and develop it. I took a shot on this set, and wish I hadn’t. It made my hair so silky, that it doesn’t hold any texture at all. The pictures are my hair after the first wash with this set vs. it’s natural air dried wave. I don’t know how they market this as a product to help waves and curls. I’m just going to use it on my little girls straight hair and go back to Shea Moisture.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Lightweight
Review: Great product for wavy hair. I layer this with a gel on soaking wet hair and it really helps define and clump. I would say it definitely needs a gel or a mousse because it has little to no hold. Has a faint coconut scent to me I don’t get pineapple at all

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Not greasy, leaves hair feeling soft <3
Review: Easily one of the best products I've ever used (33y). I've spent a lot of my life looking for a product that wouldn't leave my hair hard as wax or greasy. I think I've finally found a product to stick with. I just hope irony doesn't rear its ugly head and then the place goes out of business leaving me searching for another 20 years.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Hydration
Review: It provides a great hydration to my hair. I have 2c/3b hair texture w some loose curls here & there, Since I live in a hot humid area I’m always struggling w frizz & lack of definition. When using this mask I notice my hair seems more juicy & defined, & it smells great. Doesn’t feel heavy but it’s not light either(does that make sense?) but it provides enough moisture. I do find I need to use conditioner to be able to distribute it though out, as soon as it’s on, it feels very rich. works great so far. I would deff recommend to somebody who needs a little hydration boost.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: I'm obsessed...
Review: I accidentally ordered 2 of these instead of 1, but I'm in love with this conditioner so I'm happy for the spare!! It smells so good, like a yummy tropical vacation. I like the ingredients, I like that it doesn't have silicones. The best part of this conditioner is how lightweight it is, yet it actually detangles my hair. I have naturally wavy and very tangly hair and I always comb through it after putting conditioner in. This passes the comb-through test. A lot of other conditioners are just heavy, but don't actually detangle. This one detangles, makes my hair super soft and shiny after rinsing, enhances my natural wavy texture, and smells amazing. I will definitely be ordering more!!!!!

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: My hair surprisingly loves this product
Review: I have 3c hair (confused on my exact porosity) and this is the only product I have been happy with after experimenting with other leave ins and oils for about a year. My hair loves moisture and it was difficult to find a leave in that wouldn't dry so quickly. What i really liked about this leave in was that I only needed water to refresh my curls after a while. Usually I have to redo my curls all together (re add random leave in, add water, try not to cry and get frustrated lol)  throughout the day and other products tend to make my hair stiff and dry so I try to find moisture combinations that work. I wasn't afraid to use this everyday and that says a lot.  I also noticed less shedding with this cream. I thought it was because I was taking better care of my hair in general, but when I ran out of Pacifica and started using not so good cheap products, my hair started to shed a lot again. This is the only product I feel like my hair is safe with for now! I literally just ordered my second bottle and the new curl pomade. My hair can't deal with the mess of gels and oils and random leave ins any longer. My only complaints are that I wish the bottle was bigger and the smell lasted longer. I think less is more because I have to make sure I spread the cream throughout my hair and use a little more water and oil combinations and then my hair is nice and soft and surprisingly bouncy. If your hair has a love-hate relationship with protein, then use less and make sure it's spread out evenly! (It contains coconut oil) It's meant to be a lightweight product, I just got carried away because I literally love this product lol. My hair is strange to me. As someone with fine curly wavyish strands but high volume "ethnic" hair, the right amount goes a long way.  I used way more than other reviews said because my hair loves the moisture. I was low-key surprised this worked on my hair type lol. It made my hair routine more enjoyable. Instead of redoing my hair when I want to refresh my curls now all I do is add water and maybe an oil to seal but this cream contains oil and leaves my scalp soft and massageable lol. I'm so wary of products that claim to be vegan and silicone free but this formula is what I needed so far.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Perfect for my dry curls
Review: I have super dry, curly, fine hair. I've basically been searching for balanced products my entire life. I had purchased Pacifica's lilac lotion, and knew their quality, so I took a gamble on the conditioner. Although pineapple is my favorite fruit, I must say this smells a little too sickly sweet for me (like right before a pineapple is about to go). That aside, OH MY GOD, it's the creamiest, non-greasy, buttery conditioner I have ever used! I LOVE how my curls feel and look, and the great news is that the scent mostly disappears after you rinse it out. Once my hair is dry I hardly notice the pineapple at all. I paid less than $5 here for my 8 oz. tube, and feel like I got a great bargain. The curls are shiny, bouncy, and my hair is SO soft. It's a winner!

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Watery and not great quality - my heart is broken
Review: I bought this before and liked it before I learned about hair types and what good conditioners are supposed to feel like. Recently purchased again and was sad to find how terrible this product actually is.It’s very watery, which means you’ll go through the bottle quickly. Even with more product, it never actually seems to coat the hair, and does virtually nothing to detangle or give your hair any softness or silkiness.The scent is quite  strong for being one of the last ingredients. It’s a mix of pineapple and coconut, so if you’re looking to smell like an island (or a cocktail), look no further!But sadly, I’ve found better cheaper conditioners with more for my money at any drugstore.No hard feelings, Pineapple Curls. I really wanted to love you.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Moisturizing but not a thick conditioner
Review: My hair is low porosity, 3b, medium density, caucasian. My hair is weighed down easily so I like this light conditioner... it allows me to be more heavy handed with styling products, which I like. The consistency of this conditioner is rather thin and it takes a lot of product to feel like my hair is coated. And I have short hair. I like hyaluronic acid for my skin and hair, and I appreciate the curl-friendly, cruelty free ingredients. Beforehand I use a cowash or shampoo. After I rinse out the Pineapple Curls I put in leave-in conditioner. If your hair is thick or coarse in any way, you won't be satisfied with this. I can't image a lot of curly girls loving this, but if you have waves or loose curls this would be great for you.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Good stuff
Review: I have a head full of natural curly hair and for years I've been using wen. I was afraid to even you something else because my hair is so thick and coarse and I didn't think anything else would work boy was I wrong I also used to shampoo with it I'm serious when I say I didn't have high hopes but I was willing to give it a try because I'm all about not hurting a bunny to clean my hair the stuff is vegan and cruelty-free I hope that matters to you all

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Weightless Definition
Review: Love this stuff! Summertime my hair needs help being tamed and in winter it needs some extra hydration and help to get my curls back. This product does it all! It does feel a heavy/thick to touch but feels weightless once in my hair. Not to mention it smells wonderful!

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Love this!

I can't imagine spending more money on shampoo and conditioner, even though my stylist insists on making me love the pricier alternatives when I get my hair done. But a little bit goes a long way with these products! Definitely will be buying again.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Dries out my hair
Review: Shampoo completely dries out my hair. I have to use extra leave in conditioner. Smells good. Feels horrible.On a side note: Shampoo bottle opened during shipping for the second time. Spilled and made a mess of everything else in my order.Not ordering ever again

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Heavy & Greasy
Review: Smells good but is very thick and has a hair gel type feel. It’s even worse once your hair has dried, it feels like you haven’t washed your hair in months and leaves residue on hands. I have long wavy hair, it didn’t really even hold curl well.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Buy buy buy

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: This is counterfeit!
Review: I ordered this because my local store that carries it was out and I needed it within the next couple days.  What I received is not the same as what I've been using.  The bottle didn't "feel" right, the colors/design/size of the bottle was off, there was no foil safety seal on the tube opening, the scent of the product wasn't anything fruity as you would expect from something with pineapple in the name ... I don't think that this is legit Pacifica product.  Returned immediately.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Smells great but that’s it
Review: Having extremely curly hair I was looking for a change up in my routine and decided I’d give this one a try from the high reviews. It smells great just like pineapple and the scent seems to last a long time however, it feels like it dries my curls out. Being a natural product this isn’t what I expected at all and I was highly disappointed. Go with something that’ll help your curls not damage them, would highly not recommend.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Perfect for me!
Review: I wish there was more per bottle or larger ounces available because I use a golfball sized amount or more (my hair goes past my mid back). The scent is 10/10 and just lightly lingers for 3ish days after wash. This doesn't FEEL lightweight when using because it has oils in it and an amazing slip for detangling. However, my hair doesn't seem like it's weighed out at all.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Wow! Smooth, Bouncy, Perfect Curls

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Didn't work for me

This product dried out my hair, and left my hair looking super greasy even after it was freshly washed. The first few tries, I thought this effect was from using too much product. However, I still had this issue even when using a very small amount of product. I would not reccomend this product.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Lovely on my daughters ringlets!
Review: This works so well on my 3YO hair. She has ringlets ( no idea how she got them and I’m trying to figure out the best products for her hair). This helps the curls stay together better and keeps her hair moisturized. Awesome scent too! I would recommend!

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free

This combo has kept my hair under control and shows off my waves without letting them turn into a fluffy gross mountain of hair on my head like it used to be. I was concerned with the small size but the bottle lasts me at least a month. Plus it smells great!!

Title: THE WORST PRODUCT EVER!

I love using it with Pacifica’s shampoo for wavy hair!

Title: What curl?!

Review: Definitely a great choice for curlies and wavy hair. I think it works best layered with an oil for moisture and shine as it is very lightweight. I’ve used better creams for my thin porous 3C hair, like Curls Blueberry line, but this one is almost as good, and definitely will be someone’s favorite. It has a great scent that my boyfriend is addicted to.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: NOT FOR KINKY/COILY HAIR!
Review: My hair was completely detangled and knit-free at the beginning of the washing process. After using the matching shampoo without issue, I applied this conditioner and the nightmare began. As soon as I squeezed the product through my tresses, I realized that there was a huge problem. My hair was no longer tangle-free. In fact I couldn't run my fingers through it at all. The hair was instantly deeply matted. It took 10 hours (over the span of 3 days....thank you God for the miracle of telecommuting....) to work out the tangled mess, cutting quite a bit along the way. And after all of that, I still couldn't free the last 15% and had to cut it down.I almost never leave reviews, but I had to try to help even 1 fellow Curly. IF YOU HAVE TYPE 4 COILS, THIS IS NOT YOUR PRODUCT!!! The attached picture is about 25% of what I lost (Bottle cap for scale).Curlfriend, just don't do it.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Can’t be without it.
Review: I am a long time user of just about every Pacifica product and have never been disappointed.  My hair is healthy chest level length and colored bright red. I have a mix of small banana curls, waves, stretched out curls and a few straight pieces mixed in. with NY weather any day could be an unruly or a frizz day. And I hate gel and hair spray. I keep things natural. Icurrently use the sea salt wave cream and I love it but I wanted just a touch more of a “molded hold”.  It keeps my hair soft bouncy and I truly look like so just left the beach. This pineapple cream great and is a little thicker and has a Nice hold to it which does make Are my hair a little crunchy.  I mix the two and its perfect. Just what I want a nice full fluff with a touch of hold that isn’t sticky or stiff and they both smell delicious. I Will be buying stock in them both before they discontinue any thing.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Smells yummy, lovely shine and bounce to my hair
Review: I have 2a-2c waves and loose spirals with medium thickness, porosity and texture. Most curl creams I’ve tried either weighed my hair down or made my ends look dry. I have very sensitive skin so I am picky what goes on my hair. I used about a tablespoon of this with a denman brush and got the softest, shiniest, thickest wave/curl clumps I’ve ever had. I went out in 110* heat a few hours later and minimal frizz. I am very  happy and will definitely be using this every wash day. I wish they had a pineapple gel.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Amazing product!
Review: I have been looking for a pomade that is gluten free and non toxic. I bought these pomade for my husband.  This works so well. I'm going to buy more soon!!

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Left hair feeling dirty.
Review: I tried this product on my wavy/curly (depends on the humidity) hair hoping to define my waves/curly. It left my hair feeling dirty and greasy, and did absolutely nothing to define my waves or curls. I only used a tiny dab.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Smells amazing!
Review: This stuff smells awesome! It’s great if you like to wear your natural curls. Definition without feeling heavy or greasy! Recommend this if you’re looking for eco and vegan friendly hair care.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Feels dry, it takes while to moisturize
Review: I generally LOVE Pacifica products for both contents and packaging, but this conditioner is not what I expected. When applied, it feels dry to where my hair doesn't feel like being moisturized. It took a good 5 minutes or more to have my hair feels soft. Maybe just me, but I would not buy it again. It didn't smell that good either. I might have received an old product? It could be...

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Makes my curls feel dryer
Review: I bought this because my curly hairs need a lot of moisture and this promised to deliver on that. However, I feel like I have to use a TON of product to barely achieve that. My hair feels super dry and not at all conditioned and it feels greasy as soon as I wash it. I know it's this product because of the fact when I use the shampoo with other conditions I don't have that problem.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Wouldn’t buy again
Review: I love the Pacifica Pineapple hair products except this one. It didn’t refresh my curls frizzy.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Meh, but smells great
Review: I like the smell and consistency. It does not help define my curls or reduce my frizz. I cannot use this as a stand alone curl cream.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Good buy!!!
Review: Did exactly what it says it does! I used just a quarter size of this cream and no other products. My hair was left soft and there is no frizz! I will continue to use this product and excited to try out other products made by Pacifica!!!

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Trash
Review: I kind of hate this conditioner. It doesnt moisturize my hair nor does it help detangle.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Doesn’t make my hair crunchy
Review: Nice smell and light

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Love it
Review: Love it

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Bring Back the Waves!
Review: I have natural waves but it typically looks wild and unpolished. But when I apply Pacifica Beauty Pineapple Swirl Curl Defining Cream when my hair is (semi-)wet and let it air dry, I get dreamy waves and it looks like I styled my hair. It's great for low maintenance folks who want their hair to look and smell great without putting in work.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Not a fan
Review: It’s very thin consistency. I have wavy hair I bought this because I thought it would be a good lightweight conditioner that is more natural but I find my hair is a little dry but also has a weird texture.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Nice scent
Review: Love the scent but this curl product is too heavy for my fine, wavy hair  (2A/B).  I use sparingly on my dry tips and it works well as a light detangler.

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: Fast shipping
Review: These were individually wrapped to ensure other items weren’t up. They shipped fast and smell amazing

Product: Pacifica Beauty, Pineapple Curls Curl Defining Cream, For Curly, Coily and Textured Hair Types, Fresh Pineapple Scent, With Hyaluronic Acid + Coconut Oil, Silicone Free, 100% Vegan and Cruelty Free
Title: My favorite hair product ever
Review: This product is incredible! Worked amazing on my natural curls. You should definitely try this.

Review: Amazing products. Fantastic for my natural curls.

Title: Wonderful
Review: Had a great hair day with this product
