Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Good!
Review: It looks good and smell well. I'm not giving it 5 stars as it wasn't what I wanted or like. The sea ​​salt is thick and won't stay in my head to actually be able to rub it and exfoliates my scalp. Maybe other people like it but for me, it didn't do what I was expecting it to do.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Rosemary mint serum
Review: I really enjoy this product. I love the way my scalp feels after the applications. I love the fragrance and the solution is absorbed very quickly. This product does not leave my hair feeling grease or heavy. I follow the Korean Ten Step Hair Routine and for the number of products used this is perfect.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Terrible
Review: Don’t waste your money on this product. I wish I read the reviews before purchasing. It contains large chunks of salt that are to big to be effective. Smells nice. But who ever made this product never tried to use it. Very thick and hard to get past hair to your scalp.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Soothing
Review: Works great! I received it quickly and it soothes the scalp. My scalp gets irritated, so this helps calm it. I just wish they made it in a leave in formula for the week.  Or even as a daily use! Thank you!

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Eh..
Review: It is very hard to actually get it onto your scalp and I had to use a lot. I only have a chin length bob. It smells good, but the directions are unclear so I won't be buying this again. I feel like the tube would only last 3-4 uses. I didn't notice an effect after using it either.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Smells Amazing!
Review: This feels so good on my scalp! It does not burn, I can leave it on for hours or just a few before a shower. This product cleared buildup and has prevented my hair from being so oily between washes. Will buy again!

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Works great for fine hair
Review: I started using this product a few months back, however, the store I bought it from is no longer carrying it.  I love the scent and how it makes my scalp feel after using it.  My hair, which has grown more fine now that I'm older also has more body to it.  Thanks again Amazon...I knew you'd come through for me!

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Didn't help
Review: I bought this to use as an overnight treatment for my itchy/flakey scalp.  I didn't notice any improvement after I washed it out the next morning.  I ended up returning it and buying the Badger jojoba hair oil instead and that worked REALLY well for my issue

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Less a scrub, more of a wash

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Tricky to use but helpful
Review: My scalp is incredibly sensitive. I have tried a lot of products over the years to get it to calm down, from prescription Nizoral to tea tree oil to tar shampoo and apple cider vinegar, but it's only cleared up temporarily at best. I saw this and decided to give it a try. The comments about the chunks of salt are on point; the scrub could be pulverized into a much finer paste, and bits of salt literally clinked in the sink when they fell off my scalp. I also found it 100% impossible to use with dry hair - I had to wet my hair so I could part it enough to apply the scrub. Having said that, once I got it in my hair and on my scalp, I was able to scrub it into a bit of a lather (maybe because of the jojoba oil?) and work it into the skin. The effect has been SO satisfying! My scalp is actually clear - free of irritated patches and dandruff - and my hair feels great! I did not shampoo at all, just used a heavy duty conditioner afterward, as the scrub made the hair feel quite dry at first. I am picking little dots of charcoal out of my hair here and there, but that's a small price to pay for not having an oozing, itchy scalp.For future use, I'm going to get some kind of a squirt bottle (like they use for hair dye), add a little warm water to dissolve the larger salt particles, and use it with wet hair. I may coat the length of my hair with coconut oil and let the whole thing sit for awhile, like a deep conditioning treatment. Overall, I wouldn't use this product if you don't have a problem with dandruff/scalp conditions, because of the way the product is formatted, but it is truly useful if you have issues with your scalp.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: How is rock salt good for your hair?
Review: The chunks of salt in this could be put in a salt grinder they are so big!  This would not feel good on any part of your body. let alone on your scalp, it seems like it would be more damaging to your hair by breaking it. And cutting it.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Non-greasy and definitely helps with scalp itching/flaking
Review: I love this product! The first time I tried it I felt it didn’t do anything but it definitely doesn’t work over night. I gave it a second chance and have been using it consistently for months now and I love it! I notice a difference in my scalp itchiness on nights I skip it.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Didn’t work

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Huge salt chunks and it doesn't work very well
Review: The salt is incredibly thick and hard to rinse out.Not that great. Bummer

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Instant Relief
Review: I have the most incredible itch on my scalp, particulary the back of my head. I'm still trying to figure out if the cause is from the detergent i use on my pillow case, the soap i use, or some sort of infection... I use various oils and lotions for my scalp to relieve the itch, but i know that these things can build up over time, and its best to backtrack on the first product to reach my head, which would be the shampoo. In conjunction to this product, i've tried an apple cider vinegar wash, which made no difference to the severe itch i was having. On that day when i used apple cider vinegar, I had to go back in the shower to wash with the Pacifica scrub, and the minute it touch my scalp, i had instant relif! I sighed as if i was having the best massage. I couldnt believe how immediate i received results. I've used it for two weeks so far, and i'm happy to be relatively itch fee (i occassionally get itchy scalp from laying on my pillow or if i wash my hair with hot water, but i never get itchy if i wash with cooler water and use this product.I'm sad that other customers are having trouble with the large grains of salt. I have slightly textured hair that is very fine, very very dry, and is sparce (my hair follicles are very spaced out, i have excruciatingly thin hair and not at all attractive). So i dont have trouble rinsing out the grains, although i do take a bit longer than normal to fully rinse out everything. Using my nails help with removing the chunks.I do recommend this product and i plan on making this my go-to itch reliever.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Terrible for curls
Review: Hate is a strong word but I really really dislike this product for my hair. I’ve been finding micro beads in my scalp for DAYS!

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz
Title: Loveee
Review: I love this so much if you ever have an itchy scalp I recommend this so much. The texture of my scalp feels nicer as well as my hair, and I think the scrub has encouraged growth as well.

Fortunately, odor does not linger long.  I use a rosemary conditioner and it smells nothing like this.  I will use up the tube, but will not repurchase.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Purifies Revives Scalp Vegan CrueltyFree, Clear, 2 Fl Oz

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: It's water... underwhelming.
Review: I was highly anticipating this as a close friend of mine loves Pacifica's products (she hasn't tried this one in particular.) I'm not one to usually go after the latest "snake oil", my intentions were really just to have that advertised good smell and maybe feel like my scalp was fresher afterwards. I'm SO disappointed. It's... water. Yes, it's a little slick, there are oils etc in it. It has an herbal smell of some kind (not one I recognize as Rosemary Mint) but only if I practically have my nose in the bottle. I tried this before shampooing as instructed and honestly my hair just felt gross and I couldn't smell or feel anything while massaging into my scalp. I will say the saving grace was that the return process was a breeze. They offered me returnless refund via Amazon credit, which I'm fine with.If Pacifica works for you, great. Maybe this was a weak/bad batch, I don't know. But I will say I had a better smelling and more cleansing experience using my husband's $2 Rosemary Mint Suave shampoo.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: I like it
Review: This is my first scalp serum. I have very itchy and oily scalp and hoped to find a product that would soothe. I wouldn't say this has a cooling effect, but it makes my roots feel nourished and decreases some build-up. I like to massage one full dropper of serum into my scalp after washing my hair. It leaves absolutely no stickiness or residue.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Perky hair overnight
Review: Not sure about the negative reviews.  This product is great!  My hair is perky at the roots and for someone (me) with super fine hair and thingning it makes a huge difference.  I usually do an overnight treatment and today trying an after shower leave in treatment.  Definitely recommend this but you have figure out what works for you as far as treatment.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Relief for itchy scalp. Great for wig wearers!
Review: I was experiencing itching in the area I wear my wig grip band, and it was driving me up the wall. This product provided relief from a dry irritated scalp. However, I had to use it more frequently than directed.  After a few days of applications and hair washings the itchiness went away.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Pacifica produces another GEM!
Review: This is a hidden gem product. I love Pacifica, but I haven't tried everything they offer. This stuff made an immediate impact on my hair, which is vibrantly colored. It smells fresh and delicious. It's softening, soothing, and refreshing. It just plain works, so don't hesitate to give it a try. As far as I know, you can return it if you don't like it, but I'm hoping you will love it as much as I do.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Not worth the money.
Review: This scrub has huge pieces of sea salt in the formula but no matter how thoroughly I scrub I can’t feel them. I have short hair too. This product seemed to make my scalp more irritated than anything. The product was not a cohesive scrub it fell apart immediately when it got on my hands. I ended up stepping on more of the product in the shower than what actually ended up on my scalp.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Too chunky
Review: This smells really nice, but doesn't seem to do much scrubbing, as the particles are quite coarse and there aren't many of them to begin with. It seemed like 3 or 4 chunks of salt per square inch of scalp.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: This contains small rocks.
Review: This scalp scrub has rocks in it.  I have thick hair and it was hard to wash all the rocks out of my hair.  I had my hair up at work. My scalp was itchy and sore. I had a small rock still stuck in my hair near my scalp.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Has my scalp free of ingrown hairs
Review: After years of painful ingrown hairs on back of my scalp, my Barber recommended this due to her personal experience. I bought it doubting my lifelong problem would be fixed. One use and my scalp looked and felt COMPLETELY different within two weeks. Now, me, my barber as well as the shop owner recommend this to everyone they meet who has ingrown hairs on their scalp. It’s better than any of the other 5 products I own.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Easy to use & helped my dry, itchy scalp.
Review: I have been using this a few nights a week for about a month as an overnight scalp treatment. It has a thin, viscous texture. The texture and ingredients are fairly similar to a basic facial serum (hyaluronic acid, b5,aloe, witch hazel). I apply 4 droppers full in lines over my scalp from front to back, then massage it gently into the scalp and comb the residue through my roots before bed. In the am I shower as usual. This winter had been pretty hard on my skin in general with me needing extra thick moisturizers on my full arms and legs as opposed to just my knees and elbows. This has really helped with my dry, itchy scalp. I don't think this serum would work for a scalp condition like dandruff that needs medication; but for just a dry scalp it really made a difference. I took a star off for the poor dropper. It seems to have trouble pulling the product from the container.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: PAIN to use!!
Review: This stuff is a PAIN to use! It is HARD to get down into the roots and the salt grains are HUGE, they just roll off of your head! If the salt crystals were 1/4 the size, it would be much easier to use. It smells great, but the poor instructions on the tube dont explain how to use it to get the most benefit.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Perfect Pacifica Addition
Review: I’ve been looking for a product to clear my crown chakra and this does the trick with sage. It soothes and hydrates the scalp just like a spa treatment. Simply massage into scalp then shampoo out or leave in overnight.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Not Impressed
Review: Like many others were saying this product isn't right. I was surprised the beads weren't water dissolvable. So you get it in your hair and it is a pain to get out. AVOID if you have thick or a lot of hair. My hair is short and all the way thru shampooing and conditioning I was still picking out those little beads. It smells like tea tree oil but a little lighter so that wasn't bad. It is not an easy product to work with overall. I wouldn't recommend.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Meh
Review: Like other reviews have said, its really hard to get a good scrub out if this. It’s too chunky & doesn't get to your scalp easily. I made sure to follow instructions with sectioning my hair but it still just ended up in my hair & not my scalp. I used the whole bottle to try & give it a fair shot but it’s not worth repurchasing. Plus it runs out too fast.The only reason for the 2 star was the smell & “minty” feeling it gives my hair.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: It smells great! Wish it worked better
Review: I have a lot of build up on my scalp similar to psoriasis. I get a lot of flakes and then oily patches. I bought this to help as a pre treatment to break up the patches. It smelled great and loved the way it felt on my scalp. Not sure it made much a differece on my scalp even after using as an overnight treatment.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Pacifica
Review: I really enjoyed using this. It has a very light scent and is really great when using to massage the scalp. I know it says only to use 3 to 4 drops but it requires a few more than that be able to distribute throughout your scalp. Other than that it is marvelous.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Great for scalp, works for me.
Review: This product smells great and I use it once a week to help with dry scalp and build up. So far no complaints.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Witch hazel is not for the scalp.
Review: When I used this product the first time it did give me a sense of relief from my itchy scalp but the second night I used it, it irritated it and made it much worse for days. I also did some research on whether or not if you should use witch hazel on your scalp and it specifically said online not to. All because there is a potential risk of irritation, especially if you have sensitive skin.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Great for Dry Scalps
Review: I’ve always had an incredibly dry scalp and with this stuff, it’s been really amazing.I greatly changed my hair routine from washing every other day, to every 2-3 days. And the day before I use scalp serum, and then shower the next day.Using this, and clarifying conditioner and or shampoo SERIOUSLY helps with flakes!My scalp has literally never been so moisturized.Highly recommend. Will keep buying this great product!

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Didn't work for me.

I have long think hair and it was difficult for me to get the scrub to where I wanted it on my head while moving my hair around. I really could only exfoliate the edges of my scalp. It almost felt like I needed to do it outside of the shower and section off my hair. Not a fan.

My scalp felt itchy after and I kept finding seed type things (I think that this was a part of the exfoliant). The smell wasn't bad but not rinsing clean is definitely a deal breaker for me.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz

My hair, which has grown more fine now that I'm older also has more body to it.  Thanks again Amazon...I knew you'd come through for me!

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Tricky to use but helpful
Review: My scalp is incredibly sensitive. I have tried a lot of products over the years to get it to calm down, from prescription Nizoral to tea tree oil to tar shampoo and apple cider vinegar, but it's only cleared up temporarily at best. I saw this and decided to give it a try. The comments about the chunks of salt are on point; the scrub could be pulverized into a much finer paste, and bits of salt literally clinked in the sink when they fell off my scalp. I also found it 100% impossible to use with dry hair - I had to wet my hair so I could part it enough to apply the scrub. Having said that, once I got it in my hair and on my scalp, I was able to scrub it into a bit of a lather (maybe because of the jojoba oil?) and work it into the skin. The effect has been SO satisfying! My scalp is actually clear - free of irritated patches and dandruff - and my hair feels great! I did not shampoo at all, just used a heavy duty conditioner afterward, as the scrub made the hair feel quite dry at first. I am picking little dots of charcoal out of my hair here and there, but that's a small price to pay for not having an oozing, itchy scalp.For future use, I'm going to get some kind of a squirt bottle (like they use for hair dye), add a little warm water to dissolve the larger salt particles, and use it with wet hair. I may coat the length of my hair with coconut oil and let the whole thing sit for awhile, like a deep conditioning treatment. Overall, I wouldn't use this product if you don't have a problem with dandruff/scalp conditions, because of the way the product is formatted, but it is truly useful if you have issues with your scalp.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: How is rock salt good for your hair?
Review: The chunks of salt in this could be put in a salt grinder they are so big!  This would not feel good on any part of your body. let alone on your scalp, it seems like it would be more damaging to your hair by breaking it. And cutting it.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Non-greasy and definitely helps with scalp itching/flaking
Review: I love this product! The first time I tried it I felt it didn’t do anything but it definitely doesn’t work over night. I gave it a second chance and have been using it consistently for months now and I love it! I notice a difference in my scalp itchiness on nights I skip it.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Instant Relief
Review: I have the most incredible itch on my scalp, particulary the back of my head. I'm still trying to figure out if the cause is from the detergent i use on my pillow case, the soap i use, or some sort of infection... I use various oils and lotions for my scalp to relieve the itch, but i know that these things can build up over time, and its best to backtrack on the first product to reach my head, which would be the shampoo. In conjunction to this product, i've tried an apple cider vinegar wash, which made no difference to the severe itch i was having. On that day when i used apple cider vinegar, I had to go back in the shower to wash with the Pacifica scrub, and the minute it touch my scalp, i had instant relif! I sighed as if i was having the best massage. I couldnt believe how immediate i received results. I've used it for two weeks so far, and i'm happy to be relatively itch fee (i occassionally get itchy scalp from laying on my pillow or if i wash my hair with hot water, but i never get itchy if i wash with cooler water and use this product.I'm sad that other customers are having trouble with the large grains of salt. I have slightly textured hair that is very fine, very very dry, and is sparce (my hair follicles are very spaced out, i have excruciatingly thin hair and not at all attractive). So i dont have trouble rinsing out the grains, although i do take a bit longer than normal to fully rinse out everything. Using my nails help with removing the chunks.I do recommend this product and i plan on making this my go-to itch reliever.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Terrible for curls
Review: Hate is a strong word but I really really dislike this product for my hair. I’ve been finding micro beads in my scalp for DAYS!

The texture of my scalp feels nicer as well as my hair, and I think the scrub has encouraged growth as well.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: May work best for fine, thin hair types
Review: Works great for my fine, thin hair. It’s a little chunky when first applied but add a touch more water and it gives a good lather to move the exfoliants around. Smells lovely.  Rinses out great. My hair is super soft and clean afterwards.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Product is clumpy and difficult to get to my scalp through my hair.
Review: I tend to get areas of flaky buildup on my scalp at least 1x a month, bought product hoping to eliminate that buildup in one use but found the product did not get to most areas I wanted to reach.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: WORST SCRUB EVER
Review: The consistency is really weird, it’s gel like but the moment it touches hair it turns into basically a glue which makes it impossible to scrub, not to mention there’s so many plastic beads. Once the gel went away all the beads kept falling out of my hair and made a mess in my bathroom. Not worth anything and completely useless

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Would not buy again
Review: Not a very good scent. You can barely smell anything. Not worth pay g money for this product.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Odor Too Strong
Review: I had no problem getting this on my scalp.  It seems to do a good job of getting the skin clean and didn’t leave a lot of residue on my head.  Some granules got stuck under my fingernails, but washed out. I found the strong smell to be obnoxious.  It’s like using mouth wash on your hair, and did not blend well with my shampoo.  Fortunately, odor does not linger long.  I use a rosemary conditioner and it smells nothing like this.  I will use up the tube, but will not repurchase.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Good for dry scalp!
Review: I liked this so much I reordered . My scalp was feeling dry and itching . Bought this and it took care of the problem .

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Ehhhhhh
Review: Ehhh just skip this and just get some head and shoulders

Product: Pacifica Beauty Rosemary Detox Scalp Scrub, For All Hair Types, Vegan & Cruelty Free, 4 Fl Oz
Title: Light weight
Review: I love the scent and the feel of it on my scalp

Product: Pacifica Beauty Sunshine Highs Purple Shampoo and Conditioner for Neutralizing Yellow Tones, Tone Blonde & Silver Hair for Color Treated Hair, 100% Vegan & Cruelty Free, Vanilla, 2 Count
Title: Very nice purple shampoo, I Love pacifica!
Review: The shampoo smells more natural like an orange peel. It lathers up super nice and spreads through my hair very good. The conditioner didn't automatically soak into my hair the way most do. I clipped it up when I washed my body and when I was done with my body I unclipped my hair to the conditioner super soaked up and my hair felt soft after rinsing. It leaves all the right stuff to your hair. It smells more vanilla like and is lovely. My blonde(natural) is looking great. The purple is very rich in color

Product: Pacifica Beauty Sunshine Highs Purple Shampoo and Conditioner for Neutralizing Yellow Tones, Tone Blonde & Silver Hair for Color Treated Hair, 100% Vegan & Cruelty Free, Vanilla, 2 Count
Title: Nope
Review: I wanted to love this, but it didn't work for my hair. It DID tone my blonde, but it dried my hair out something awful and left it tangled and difficult to manage.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Sunshine Highs Purple Shampoo and Conditioner for Neutralizing Yellow Tones, Tone Blonde & Silver Hair for Color Treated Hair, 100% Vegan & Cruelty Free, Vanilla, 2 Count
Title: Goodbye yellow hair
Review: I have been a blond for many years and always battled yellow hair. I have tried many shampoos and even Wella toners and nothing ever worked. Hair kept being yellow. I picked up this at Marshalls by accident and let me tell you: IT WORKS. I was surprised with the results.It dries out your hair a little so, using another product to treat the hair is a must but for the color 100% efficient.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Sunshine Highs Purple Shampoo and Conditioner for Neutralizing Yellow Tones, Tone Blonde & Silver Hair for Color Treated Hair, 100% Vegan & Cruelty Free, Vanilla, 2 Count
Title: Love!

Product: Pacifica Beauty Sunshine Highs Purple Shampoo and Conditioner for Neutralizing Yellow Tones, Tone Blonde & Silver Hair for Color Treated Hair, 100% Vegan & Cruelty Free, Vanilla, 2 Count
Title: Gets rid of all yellow and brassiness!
Review: This shampoo and conditioner smells amazing and gets rid of any unwanted colors. It also made my blonde even lighter! After two washes my blonde in like platinum! Beware, it will dry out your hair so what I do is mix the purple conditioner with my normal conditioner. Also the use of hair masks helps while using this product. Even though it is drying I will always choose this purple shampoo.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Sunshine Highs Purple Shampoo and Conditioner for Neutralizing Yellow Tones, Tone Blonde & Silver Hair for Color Treated Hair, 100% Vegan & Cruelty Free, Vanilla, 2 Count
Title: the best blonde brightening shampoo
Review: I've tried EVERY purple shampoo out there to keep my blonde a cool tone (it tends to get very red/brassy very quickly) I'm going on 4 months since my last color and this is the only thing that keeps it ashy. I've tried shampoo that's 5x the price and it wasn't as effective as this one

Product: Pacifica Beauty Vegan Silk Shampoo + Conditioner Set, Vanilla, Almond Oil, Shea Butter, Vitamin B for Dry and Damaged Hair, Hydration, Shine, Silky Smooth, Clean Hair Care, 20 Oz
Title: Leaves Hair Soft & Healthy
Review: I am very sensitive to synthetic fragrances, so for me to find a good shampoo and conditioner is a challenge. The brand I have used for the last 20 years switched up their formula and I had to stop using it. After trying many of Pacifica’s products I went with their vegan silk line. I now have it on a subscription to come once a month. I use a lot of shampoo and conditioner as I have very thick yet fine hair but it lasts plenty. It has a very mild vanilla scent which works well for me, if one wishes for something with more scent I would recommend their rosemary mint, their beach waves (smells like banana) or their rose scented shampoo and conditioner as they will leave ones hair equally soft but with more scent to them.So happy to have found Pacifica though, for the first time in 20 years I have also been able to wear perfume as their brand uses all natural fragrances. I am so stoked.

Product: Pacifica Beauty Vegan Silk Shampoo + Conditioner Set, Vanilla, Almond Oil, Shea Butter, Vitamin B for Dry and Damaged Hair, Hydration, Shine, Silky Smooth, Clean Hair Care, 20 Oz
Title: No conditioner in this package. Only received the shampoo

Title: Purchase conditioner separate please
Review: I love this shampoo and conditioner. However, you always use more conditioner than shampoo (at least I do). Why can’t I buy just the conditioner? Why do I have to buy both?
